title: Club Bug, Leader but not in?
body: My club works, my wife, brother, and several friends are in it but when I log on it doesn't show me in the club and the club tag doesn't show up next to my name. I can't leave the club because it doesn't show me in a club when I click clubs. They can't boot me from the club because I'm the leader of the club... What could be done?

replies.body:
We can try some things together, but we'll need you to submit a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so one of our specialists can get back to you about this.

Let me know if you have any questions.
